channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 22:49 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Observe by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 22:49 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Observe by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 22:43 Drawing up to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 22:43 Drawing up to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
